tool_description: Creates a detailed meal preparation timeline and strategy to optimize cooking efficiency and food freshness throughout the week.

meal_schedule_id.description: Schedule ID from Weekly Meal Scheduler

prep_time_available.description: Total time available for meal prep in minutes (60-480)

prep_sessions.description: Number of prep sessions per week (1-3)

storage_capacity.description: Storage capacity: small, medium, or large

freshness_priority.description: Whether to prioritize ingredient freshness over convenience

error_messages: Invalid schedule ID: Meal schedule not found or invalid.
Invalid prep time: Must be between 60 and 480 minutes.
Invalid prep sessions: Must be between 1 and 3 sessions per week.
Invalid storage capacity: Must be 'small', 'medium', or 'large'.
Insufficient time: Not enough prep time for the planned meals.
Equipment mismatch: Some recipes require equipment not in the available list.
usage: Provide meal_schedule_id and prep_time_available. Optionally specify prep_sessions, storage_capacity, cooking_equipment, and freshness_priority for customized planning.

prep_timeline.description: Step-by-step preparation timeline with time estimates

batch_cooking_groups.description: Groups of recipes that can be prepared together

daily_finishing_tasks.description: Quick finishing tasks for each day

total_prep_time.description: Actual total preparation time needed in minutes

time_savings.description: Estimated time saved during the week in minutes
